column4: does anybody have a clue, why i cannot install vlc 1.0.0. I addes the ppa and signing key, but update doesn't update my vlc. it's still 0.9.9.a. i also enabled multiverse
sudo apt-get update and sudo apt-get upgrade doesn't work
how did you sign the PPA?
so that's ok. And about adding the PPA to the sourcelist. How?
